key.name: enable-fingerprint-authentication
key.summary: Whether or not to allow fingerprint readers for login
key.description: The login screen can optionally allow users who have enrolled their fingerprints to log in using those prints.

key.name: enable-smartcard-authentication
key.summary: Whether or not to allow smartcard readers for login
key.description: The login screen can optionally allow users who have smartcards to log in using those smartcards.

key.name: enable-password-authentication
key.summary: Whether or not to allow passwords for login
key.description: The login screen can be configured to disallow password authentication, forcing the user to use smartcard or fingerprint authentication.

key.name: logo
key.summary: Path to small image at top of user list
key.description: The login screen can optionally show a small image to provide site administrators and distributions a way to display branding.

key.name: fallback-logo
key.summary: Path to small image at top of user list
key.description: The fallback login screen can optionally show a small image to provide site administrators and distributions a way to display branding.

key.name: disable-user-list
key.description: The login screen normally shows a list of available users to log in as. This setting can be toggled to disable showing the user list.

key.name: banner-message-enable
key.description: Set to true to show the banner message text.

key.name: banner-message-text
key.description: Text banner message to show in the login window.

key.name: disable-restart-buttons
key.description: Set to true to disable showing the restart buttons in the login window.

key.name: allowed-failures
key.description: The number of times a user is allowed to attempt authentication, before giving up and going back to user selection.
